name: Cooking Club - CaveJam
description:
#ThrowBigRocks

My CaveJam entry, untested, unoptimized and unfinished!

Known Issues:

No SFX, No Music, UngaBunga has weird chin, Ungasaurus is a bit twitchy, UngaBunga is too thicc and struggles to manouever, Ungasaurus is clumsy and misses attacks frequently
